parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the interactive messaging application.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: 1. Valid values: 1 to 100000.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of message groups to return on each page. Default value: 20.

Valid values: 1 to 50.

parameters.name: SortType
parameters.description:
The sort order. Valid values:

*   0: ascending order by time
*   1: descending order by time

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user. Each user has a unique ID in the application. You can specify multiple user IDs.
